DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct collect data management gastrointestinal urogenital bleeding event occur patient atrial fibrillation take dabigatran etexilate .
DOC.brief_title: Management Gastrointestinal Urogenital ( GI/GU ) Bleedings Atrial Fibrillation Patients Using Pradaxa
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : > =18 year age ; Confirmed diagnosis Atrial Fibrillation ( AF ) ; Documentation patient acute GI and/or GU bleeding event take least one dose dabigatran prior event . Exclusion criterion : Confirmed diagnosis valvular AF ( VAF ) ; Documentation patient take dabigatran oral anticoagulant ; Documentation patient receive thrombolytic therapy prior event ; Documentation patient enrol investigational clinical trial time event ; Medical record available .
